Serialized Form

  • Package GeneticAlgorithm

    • Class GeneticAlgorithm.Aliment

      class Aliment extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • caloriePerServing
          int caloriePerServing
          Number of calories in each serving of the aliment
        • carbPerServing
          float carbPerServing
          Amount of carbohydrate (in grams) in each serving of the aliment
        • fatPerServing
          float fatPerServing
          Amount of fat (in grams) in each serving of the aliment
        • mealTendency
          List<Meal.TENDENCY> mealTendency
          A list of meal tendencies in which the aliment is suitable to be used. It is a list since one aliment may be suitable for many meals.
        • name
          String name
          Name of the aliment
        • numOfServings
          float numOfServings
          The number of servings of the aliment
        • proteinPerServing
          float proteinPerServing
          Amount of protein (in grams) in each serving of the aliment
        • servingSize
          float servingSize
          The magnitude or size of each serving
        • servingUnit
          String servingUnit
          The measurement unit of each serving - grams - milliliters - teaspoons - tablespoons - glasses

    • Class GeneticAlgorithm.Chromosome

      class Chromosome extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • chromosome
          Map<Integer,Float> chromosome
          The map representing the key/value pairs of the chromosome. Here the key is the aliment index and the value is the number of servings of that aliment.
        • fitness
          double fitness
          The fitness or the suitability of the solution. The fitness starts off as a large negative number and approaches 0 as the Solution gets better.

    • Class GeneticAlgorithm.Crossover

      class Crossover extends Object implements Serializable

    • Class GeneticAlgorithm.Diet

      class Diet extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • breakfast
          ArrayList<MealOption> breakfast
          A list of mealOptions in breakfast
        • dinner
          ArrayList<MealOption> dinner
          A list of mealOptions in dinner
        • filename
          String filename
          The name of the editable file. When a new diet is generated, the initial value for this variable is "undefined". it can modified once the user saves it as an editable file. The file name is also displayed in the title of the diet display window.
        • lunch
          ArrayList<MealOption> lunch
          A list of mealOptions in lunch
        • path
          String path
          The path of the editable file. When a new diet is generated, the initial value for this variable is "undefined". it can modified once the user saves it as an editable file.
        • snack
          ArrayList<MealOption> snack
          A list of mealOptions in snack

    • Class GeneticAlgorithm.FitnessCalculator

      class FitnessCalculator extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • calorieConstraint
          int calorieConstraint
          The number of calories each meal option should be
        • carbConstraint
          float carbConstraint
          The amount of carbohydrates (in grams) each meal option should be
        • fatConstraint
          float fatConstraint
          The amount of fat (in grams) each meal option should be
        • mealTendency
          Meal.TENDENCY mealTendency
          The meal that this object is being used for. For instance if the algorithm is generating a breakfast, this would be Meal.BREAKFAST
        • proteinConstraint
          float proteinConstraint
          The amount of protein (in grams) each meal option should be

    • Class GeneticAlgorithm.MealOption

      class MealOption extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • aliments
          List<Aliment> aliments
          A list containing the aliments selected by the genetic algorithm. Once the best chromosome is found, the chromosome.decode() method is run to turn it into an aliment list which is a physical representation of the chromosome.
        • fitnessCalc
          FitnessCalculator fitnessCalc
          Object for calculating the fitness of each chromosome.
        • genotype
          Chromosome[] genotype
          Array containing all chromosomes of the population.
        • maxIterations
          int maxIterations
          The maximum number of generations the algorithm should go through. This is to prevent an infinite loop.
        • parentSelector
          ParentSelector parentSelector
          Object for selecting the parents of each generation of the algorithm.
        • survivorSelector
          SurvivorSelector survivorSelector
          Object for finding and replacing the least fit solutions with the generated array of offspring.

    • Class GeneticAlgorithm.ParentSelector

      class ParentSelector extends TournamentSelector implements Serializable

    • Class GeneticAlgorithm.SurvivorSelector

      class SurvivorSelector extends TournamentSelector implements Serializable

    • Class GeneticAlgorithm.TournamentSelector

      class TournamentSelector extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • k
          int k
          The number of solutions to select in each round of the tournament selection algorithm.
        • population
          Chromosome[] population
          It is the population object within the genetic algorithm.
